I really cannot find the words to fully describe this game 10/10!!!  It is the ULTIMATE  gaming experience ... It all starts with  the many memers that shake their head while you are on hook till you die  ... That shit never gets old  and is super hillarious :D . They arent even moving ... Super realistic roleplayers !!!  To top the fun charts there is this moment when you think you have survived after getting unhooked , only to realise that the killer is right behind you , tunnelling you to death . Oh man this is so exciting every time and makes you feel the adrenaline in real life ...  Buuuuttt the best part is this one perk that makes all people smile ... It is called NOED and is super fun .... Makes the game extra challenging with the oneshot mechanic it provides !!! Along with Insidious you can have many great moments in the basement . Real Intimacy  Just you - the survivor and the Entity ... But beware if another survivor tries to interrupt you , you show no mercy !!!

Hello guys 
I've played in DBD since 2018 (more or less). And finally I find some time to write some things about this game. Developers of this game create a new chapter or change maps time to time. And good for them. Changing in graphic of the every single map are still upgrading in a good way makes this game more creepy. Adding the new characters from the hooror movie or another games take attention other people even them who have never heard about that game. Probably you would've spent amazing time with your friends playing in this game. But... everything's change when you trynna play as a killer. At first probably it would be just awesome, right? But when you have higher rang (purple or red) everything just disappeared. Survivours finish the generators after a couple of seconds which means that probably you've not found any survivour yet. Later things just get worse and worse when finally they rushed generators as always and you finish the trial with three maybe more maybe less hooks. And then you think that it just don't make any sense and it's just waste of time and sometimes your health pay for that :). So if you haven't got anyone who could've played with you just think twice before you spend your money for that.
